name: Unchained
title: Solana’s Lending Market Isn’t Profitable
text:
Synopsis
The Solana lending market currently lacks profitability and significant market share, with the speaker maintaining an open-minded but critically pragmatic approach to potential future opportunities.

Key Insights
- The speaker evaluates Solana's lending market from a business perspective, not as a crypto enthusiast
- Solana's decentralized finance (DeFi) lending market, primarily through Camino, is currently not considered profitable
- Borrow rates for stablecoins on Solana are described as "quite bad"
- The speaker is willing to reconsider their position if future data demonstrates profitability
- The assessment is driven by a focus on bottom-line financial performance rather than technological enthusiasm
